name: The Callow Wraith and the Cursed Epoch
name_original: The Callow Wraith and the Cursed Epoch
description:
The Callow Wraith and the Cursed Epoch, is my first ever attempt at making a game, it is for a university Assignment that was produced in just under 2 weeks. Currently, the proto-type lacks a lot of features and needs further work, though this will be a project I will continue on and see what I can produce.

An inept, young wraith awakes from an early slumber within the catacombs, from a large tremor, filled with damned, hateful souls.

He begins his journey to the surface, collecting the soul essence of those left behind, to awaken new potentials and overcome the damned.

He will need to overcome the catacomb trials, for what awaits on the surface in this new epoch.

HOT FIX: 0.1.01

The pause menu has been fixed, future features will be added shortly.
More menu options and an enemy AI overhaul inbound.
